translation: The embodied one, having crossed beyond these three Gunas from which the body is evolved, is freed from birth, death, decay, and pain, and attains immortality.
commentary: 14.20 Gunas Gunas? Ethan these? past having crossed? Three three? embodied the embodied? Dehasamudbhavan out of which the body is evolved? birth, death, old age and suffering from birth? death? decay and pain? freed freed? Amritam immortality? ashnute attains to.Commentary Just as a river is absorbed in the ocean? so also he who has? while still alive? gone beyond the alities which form the seed from which all bodies
